**Example 1: æ— **



Input: 

```
tccli dcdb DescribeFileDownloadUrl --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId tdsql-ow728lmc \
    --ShardId shard-xxxx \
    --FilePath /cos_backup/xxxx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "7212a9ec-a235-2144-98d4-59fbe6f14d79",
```
